lines.text: O Lord hear my prayer and protect me this night for I have seen the horned devil in Pontigón forest.
Protect us, Lord, under the shadow of your wings. Keep us this night without sin.
Visit, we ask you, O Lord, this home, and repel from it all the snares of the enemy.
Let your holy angels dwell herein to preserve us in peace; and may your blessing be upon us for ever, through Christ our Lord.
Beatriz: Horned devil in Pontigón forest huh?
